mapper.select: select * from bl_cc where del_flag = '0' and pk_cc = #{pkCc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select top 1 * from bl_cc where del_flag = '0' and pk_emp_opera = #{pkEmp,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and EU_CCTYPE='0'
order by date_end desc

select top 1 * from bl_settle where del_flag = '0' and pk_emp_st = #{pkEmp,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and eu_pvtype in (1,2,4)
and (dt_sttype = '00' or dt_sttype = '20' )
and (dt_sttype = '01' or dt_sttype = '21' )
order by date_st

select top 1 * from bl_settle where del_flag = '0' and pk_emp_st = #{pkEmp,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and eu_pvtype in (1,2,4)
order by date_st

SELECT SUM ( CASE WHEN eu_direct = 1 THEN amount ELSE 0 END ) AS amt, SUM ( CASE WHEN eu_direct = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS cnt_trade, dt_paymode, CASE
WHEN DT_BANK = '0' THEN name + '(公众号/自助机)' ELSE name END DT_BANK, SUM ( CASE WHEN eu_direct =- 1 THEN amount ELSE 0 END ) AS amt_back, SUM ( CASE WHEN eu_direct =- 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS cnt_trade_back FROM ( SELECT depo.amount, eu_direct, CASE
WHEN depo.DT_BANK = 'CloudFlashPay' THEN '3' ELSE depo.dt_paymode END dt_paymode, CASE
WHEN depo.DT_BANK = 'CloudFlashPay' THEN NULL ELSE depo.DT_BANK END DT_BANK FROM bl_deposit depo LEFT JOIN bl_settle st ON st.pk_settle = depo.pk_settle JOIN bd_defdoc paymode ON ( depo.dt_paymode= paymode.code AND paymode.code_defdoclist= '110100' AND paymode.del_flag = '0' ) WHERE depo.del_flag = '0' AND ( depo.pk_cc IS NULL ) AND depo.eu_pvtype IN ( 1, 2, 4 ) AND depo.amount <> 0 AND depo.pk_org = #{pkOrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND depo.pk_emp_pay = #{pkEmp,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND ( dbo.to_char ( st.date_st, 'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS' ) <= #{dateEndStr,jdbcType=VARCHAR} or ( st.DATE_ST is null and depo.NOTE IN ( '病历本', '托儿本' ) and dbo.to_char ( depo.DATE_PAY, 'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS' ) <= #{dateEndStr,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )) ) t1 JOIN bd_defdoc paymode ON ( t1.dt_paymode = paymode.CODE AND paymode.code_defdoclist = '110100' AND paymode.del_flag = '0' ) GROUP BY t1.dt_paymode, t1.DT_BANK, name

select nvl(t2.dt_paymode, t3.dt_paymode) dt_paymode, case t2.amt when null then 0 else t2.amt end amt, case t2.cnt_trade when null then 0 else t2.cnt_trade end cnt_trade, case t3.amt_back when null then 0 else t3.amt_back end amt_back, case t3.cnt_trade_back when null then 0 else t3.cnt_trade_back end cnt_trade_back from
(select case sum(depo.amount) when null then 0 else sum(depo.amount) end amt, count(1) cnt_trade, depo.dt_paymode from bl_deposit_pi depo where depo.del_flag = '0' and (depo.flag_cc = 0 or depo.pk_cc is null) and depo.eu_direct = '1' and depo.pk_org = #{pkOrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and depo.pk_emp_pay = #{pkEmp,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and to_char(depo.date_pay,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') <= #{dateEndStr,jdbcType=VARCHAR} group by depo.dt_paymode )t2 full join (select case sum(depo.amount) when null then 0 else sum(depo.amount) end amt_back, count(1) cnt_trade_back, depo.dt_paymode from bl_deposit_pi depo where depo.del_flag = '0' and (depo.flag_cc = 0 or depo.pk_cc is null) and depo.eu_direct = '-1' and depo.pk_org = #{pkOrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and depo.pk_emp_pay = #{pkEmp,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and to_char(depo.date_pay,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') <= #{dateEndStr,jdbcType=VARCHAR} group by depo.dt_paymode )t3 on t2.dt_paymode = t3.dt_paymode order by dt_paymode

select count(distinct(case when st.pk_settle_canc is null then pv.pk_pv else NULL end)) cnt, count(distinct(case when st.pk_settle_canc is not null then pv.pk_pv else NULL end)) cnt_cancel, case sum(cg.amount) when null then 0 else sum(cg.amount) end amount, pv.pk_insu from pv_encounter pv inner join bl_op_dt cg on cg.pk_pv=pv.pk_pv and cg.flag_pv='1' and cg.del_flag = '0' inner join bl_settle st on cg.pk_settle=st.pk_settle and st.del_flag = '0' and st.eu_pvtype in (1,2,4) where pv.del_flag = '0' and (st.flag_cc = 0 or st.pk_cc is null) and st.pk_org = #{pkOrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and st.pk_emp_st = #{pkEmp,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and to_char(st.date_st,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') <= #{dateEndStr,jdbcType=VARCHAR} group by pv.pk_insu order by pv.pk_insu

select inv.pk_invcate, inv.pk_empinvoice, min(inv.code_inv) min_code_inv, max(inv.code_inv) max_code_inv, count(1) cnt from bl_invoice inv inner join bl_st_inv si on inv.pk_invoice=si.pk_invoice and si.del_flag = '0' inner join bl_settle st on si.pk_settle=st.pk_settle and st.del_flag = '0' where inv.del_flag = '0' and st.eu_pvtype in (1,2,4) and (inv.flag_cc = 0 or inv.pk_cc is null) and st.pk_org = #{pkOrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and inv.pk_emp_inv = #{pkEmp,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and to_char(inv.date_inv,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') <= #{dateEndStr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and (st.dt_sttype = '00' or st.dt_sttype = '20' )
and (st.dt_sttype = '01' or st.dt_sttype = '21' )
group by inv.pk_invcate,inv.pk_empinvoice order by min_code_inv asc

select inv.pk_invcate, inv.pk_empinvoice, inv.code_inv, inv.flag_cancel from bl_invoice inv inner join bd_invcate cate on inv.pk_invcate=cate.pk_invcate inner join bl_st_inv si on inv.pk_invoice=si.pk_invoice and si.del_flag = '0' inner join bl_settle st on si.pk_settle=st.pk_settle and st.del_flag = '0' where inv.del_flag = '0' and cate.eu_type = '0' and inv.flag_cc_cancel = '0' and inv.flag_cancel = '1' and inv.pk_emp_cancel = #{pkEmp,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and to_char(inv.date_cancel,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') <= #{dateEndStr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and (st.dt_sttype = '00' or st.dt_sttype = '20' )
and (st.dt_sttype = '01' or st.dt_sttype = '21' )
order by inv.CODE_INV asc
select pay.* from bl_cc_pay pay where pay.del_flag = '0' and pay.eu_paytype = '0' and pay.pk_cc = #{pkCc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by pay.dt_paymode
select pay.* from bl_cc_pay pay where pay.del_flag = '0' and pay.eu_paytype = '2' and pay.pk_cc = #{pkCc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by pay.dt_paymode

select case sum(dt.amount) when null then 0 else sum(dt.amount) end amount, dt.pk_insurance from bl_settle st inner join bl_settle_detail dt on st.pk_settle=dt.pk_settle and dt.del_flag = '0' where st.del_flag = '0' and pk_cc = #{pkCc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} group by dt.pk_insurance union SELECT sum(depo.amount) as amount, '1' as pk_insurance FROM bl_deposit_pi depo WHERE depo.del_flag = '0' AND depo.pk_cc = #{pkCc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} union SELECT sum(st.AMOUNT_ROUND) AS amount, '2' AS pk_insurance FROM bl_settle st where st.del_flag = '0' and pk_cc = #{pkCc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select
count(distinct(case when st.pk_settle_canc is null then pv.pk_pv else NULL end)) cnt, count(distinct(case when st.pk_settle_canc is not null then pv.pk_pv else NULL end)) cnt_cancel, case sum(cg.amount) when null then 0 else sum(cg.amount) end amount, pv.pk_insu from pv_encounter pv inner join bl_op_dt cg on cg.pk_pv=pv.pk_pv and cg.flag_pv='1' and cg.del_flag = '0' inner join bl_settle st on cg.pk_settle=st.pk_settle and st.del_flag = '0' inner join bl_cc cc on st.pk_cc=cc.pk_cc and cc.del_flag = '0' where cc.pk_cc = #{pkCc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} group by pv.pk_insu order by pv.pk_insu

select nvl(t1.pk_emp_opera,t2.pk_emp_opera) pk_emp_opera, nvl(t1.name_emp_opera, t2.name_emp_opera) name_emp_opera, case t1.amt when null then 0 else t1.amt end amt, case t1.cnt_trade when null then 0 else t1.cnt_trade end cnt_trade, case t1.amt_back when null then 0 else t1.amt_back end amt_back, case t1.cnt_trade_back when null then 0 else t1.cnt_trade_back end cnt_trade_back, case t2.amt when null then 0 else t2.amt end amt_pi, case t2.cnt_trade when null then 0 else t2.cnt_trade end cnt_trade_pi, case t2.amt_back when null then 0 else t2.amt_back end amt_back_pi, case t2.cnt_trade_back when null then 0 else t2.cnt_trade_back end cnt_trade_back_pi from (select cc.pk_emp_opera, cc.name_emp_opera, case sum(pay.amt) when null then 0 else sum(pay.amt) end amt, case sum(pay.cnt_trade) when null then 0 else sum(pay.cnt_trade) end cnt_trade, case sum(pay.amt_back) when null then 0 else sum(pay.amt_back) end amt_back, case sum(pay.cnt_trade_back) when null then 0 else sum(pay.cnt_trade_back) end cnt_trade_back from bl_cc_pay pay inner join bl_cc cc on cc.pk_cc = pay.pk_cc and cc.del_flag = '0' and cc.flag_leader = '0' and cc.eu_cctype = '0' where pay.del_flag = '0' and pay.eu_paytype = '0' and pay.pk_org = #{pkOrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and to_char(cc.date_end,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') <= #{dateEndStr,jdbcType=VARCHAR} group by cc.pk_emp_opera, cc.name_emp_opera) t1 full join (select cc.pk_emp_opera, cc.name_emp_opera, case sum(pay.amt) when null then 0 else sum(pay.amt) end amt, case sum(pay.cnt_trade) when null then 0 else sum(pay.cnt_trade) end cnt_trade, case sum(pay.amt_back) when null then 0 else sum(pay.amt_back) end amt_back, case sum(pay.cnt_trade_back) when null then 0 else sum(pay.cnt_trade_back) end cnt_trade_back from bl_cc_pay pay inner join bl_cc cc on cc.pk_cc = pay.pk_cc and cc.del_flag = '0' and cc.flag_leader = '0' and cc.eu_cctype = '0' where pay.del_flag = '0' and pay.eu_paytype = '2' and pay.pk_org = #{pkOrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and to_char(cc.date_end,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') <= #{dateEndStr,jdbcType=VARCHAR} group by cc.pk_emp_opera, cc.name_emp_opera) t2 on t1.pk_emp_opera = t2.pk_emp_opera

select nvl(t1.dt_paymode, t2.dt_paymode) dt_paymode, nvl(t1.name, t2.name) name_paymode, (case t1.amt when null then 0 else t1.amt end + case t1.amt_back when null then 0 else t1.amt_back end) amt, (case t2.amt when null then 0 else t2.amt end + case t2.amt_back when null then 0 else t2.amt_back end) amt_pi from (select pay.dt_paymode, paymode.name, case when sum(pay.amt) is null then 0 else sum(pay.amt) end amt, case when sum(pay.cnt_trade) is null then 0 else sum(pay.cnt_trade) end cnt_trade, case when sum(pay.amt_back) is null then 0 else sum(pay.amt_back) end amt_back, case when sum(pay.cnt_trade_back) is null then 0 else sum(pay.cnt_trade_back) end cnt_trade_back from bl_cc_pay pay inner join bl_cc cc on cc.pk_cc = pay.pk_cc and cc.del_flag = '0' and cc.flag_leader = '0' and cc.eu_cctype = '0' left join bd_defdoc paymode on pay.dt_paymode=paymode.code and paymode.code_defdoclist='110100' and paymode.del_flag = '0' where pay.del_flag = '0' and pay.eu_paytype = '0' and pay.pk_org = #{pkOrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and to_char(cc.date_end,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') <= #{dateEndStr,jdbcType=VARCHAR} group by pay.dt_paymode, paymode.name) t1 full join (select pay.dt_paymode, paymode.name, case when sum(pay.amt) is null then 0 else sum(pay.amt) end amt, case when sum(pay.cnt_trade) is null then 0 else sum(pay.cnt_trade) end cnt_trade, case when sum(pay.amt_back) is null then 0 else sum(pay.amt_back) end amt_back, case when sum(pay.cnt_trade_back) is null then 0 else sum(pay.cnt_trade_back) end cnt_trade_back from bl_cc_pay pay inner join bl_cc cc on cc.pk_cc = pay.pk_cc and cc.del_flag = '0' and cc.flag_leader = '0' and cc.eu_cctype = '0' left join bd_defdoc paymode on pay.dt_paymode=paymode.code and paymode.code_defdoclist='110100' and paymode.del_flag = '0' where pay.del_flag = '0' and pay.eu_paytype = '2' and pay.pk_org = #{pkOrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and to_char(cc.date_end,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') <= #{dateEndStr,jdbcType=VARCHAR} group by pay.dt_paymode, paymode.name) t2 on t1.dt_paymode = t2.dt_paymode order by dt_paymode

select nvl(t1.pk_emp_opera,t2.pk_emp_opera) pk_emp_opera, nvl(t1.name_emp_opera, t2.name_emp_opera) name_emp_opera, case t1.amt when null then 0 else t1.amt end amt, case t1.cnt_trade when null then 0 else t1.cnt_trade end cnt_trade, case t1.amt_back when null then 0 else t1.amt_back end amt_back, case t1.cnt_trade_back when null then 0 else t1.cnt_trade_back end cnt_trade_back, case t2.amt when null then 0 else t2.amt end amt_pi, case t2.cnt_trade when null then 0 else t2.cnt_trade end cnt_trade_pi, case t2.amt_back when null then 0 else t2.amt_back end amt_back_pi, case t2.cnt_trade_back when null then 0 else t2.cnt_trade_back end cnt_trade_back_pi from (select cc.pk_emp_opera, cc.name_emp_opera, case sum(pay.amt) when null then 0 else sum(pay.amt) end amt, case sum(pay.cnt_trade) when null then 0 else sum(pay.cnt_trade) end cnt_trade, case sum(pay.amt_back) when null then 0 else sum(pay.amt_back) end amt_back, case sum(pay.cnt_trade_back) when null then 0 else sum(pay.cnt_trade_back) end cnt_trade_back from bl_cc_pay pay inner join bl_cc cc on cc.pk_cc = pay.pk_cc and cc.del_flag = '0' and cc.flag_leader = '1' and cc.eu_cctype = '0' and cc.pk_emp_leader = #{pkEmpLeader,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and cc.pk_org = #{pkOrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and to_char(cc.date_leader,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') = #{dateLeaderStr,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where pay.del_flag = '0' and pay.eu_paytype = '0' group by cc.pk_emp_opera, cc.name_emp_opera) t1 full join (select cc.pk_emp_opera, cc.name_emp_opera, case sum(pay.amt) when null then 0 else sum(pay.amt) end amt, case sum(pay.cnt_trade) when null then 0 else sum(pay.cnt_trade) end cnt_trade, case sum(pay.amt_back) when null then 0 else sum(pay.amt_back) end amt_back, case sum(pay.cnt_trade_back) when null then 0 else sum(pay.cnt_trade_back) end cnt_trade_back from bl_cc_pay pay inner join bl_cc cc on cc.pk_cc = pay.pk_cc and cc.del_flag = '0' and cc.flag_leader = '1' and cc.eu_cctype = '0' and cc.pk_emp_leader = #{pkEmpLeader,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and cc.pk_org = #{pkOrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and to_char(cc.date_leader,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') = #{dateLeaderStr,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where pay.del_flag = '0' and pay.eu_paytype = '2' group by cc.pk_emp_opera, cc.name_emp_opera) t2 on t1.pk_emp_opera = t2.pk_emp_opera

select nvl(t1.dt_paymode, t2.dt_paymode) dt_paymode, nvl(t1.name, t2.name) name_paymode, (case t1.amt when null then 0 else t1.amt end + case t1.amt_back when null then 0 else t1.amt_back end) amt, (case t2.amt when null then 0 else t2.amt end + case t2.amt_back when null then 0 else t2.amt_back end) amt_pi from (select pay.dt_paymode, paymode.name, case sum(pay.amt) when null then 0 else sum(pay.amt) end amt, case sum(pay.cnt_trade) when null then 0 else sum(pay.cnt_trade) end cnt_trade, case sum(pay.amt_back) when null then 0 else sum(pay.amt_back) end amt_back, case sum(pay.cnt_trade_back) when null then 0 else sum(pay.cnt_trade_back) end cnt_trade_back from bl_cc_pay pay inner join bl_cc cc on cc.pk_cc = pay.pk_cc and cc.del_flag = '0' and cc.flag_leader = '1' and cc.eu_cctype = '0' and cc.pk_emp_leader = #{pkEmpLeader,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and cc.pk_org = #{pkOrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and to_char(cc.date_leader,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') = #{dateLeaderStr,jdbcType=VARCHAR} left join bd_defdoc paymode on pay.dt_paymode=paymode.code and paymode.code_defdoclist='110100' and paymode.del_flag = '0' where pay.del_flag = '0' and pay.eu_paytype = '0' group by pay.dt_paymode, paymode.name) t1 full join (select pay.dt_paymode, paymode.name, case sum(pay.amt) when null then 0 else sum(pay.amt) end amt, case sum(pay.cnt_trade) when null then 0 else sum(pay.cnt_trade) end cnt_trade, case sum(pay.amt_back) when null then 0 else sum(pay.amt_back) end amt_back, case sum(pay.cnt_trade_back) when null then 0 else sum(pay.cnt_trade_back) end cnt_trade_back from bl_cc_pay pay inner join bl_cc cc on cc.pk_cc = pay.pk_cc and cc.del_flag = '0' and cc.flag_leader = '1' and cc.eu_cctype = '0' and cc.pk_emp_leader = #{pkEmpLeader,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and cc.pk_org = #{pkOrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and to_char(cc.date_leader,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') = #{dateLeaderStr,jdbcType=VARCHAR} left join bd_defdoc paymode on pay.dt_paymode=paymode.code and paymode.code_defdoclist='110100' and paymode.del_flag = '0' where pay.del_flag = '0' and pay.eu_paytype = '2' group by pay.dt_paymode, paymode.name) t2 on t1.dt_paymode = t2.dt_paymode order by dt_paymode

select pi.code_pi, pi.name_pi, st.amount_st, sum(depo.amount) amt_pay, st.date_st, st.eu_stresult, inv.code_inv, st.flag_canc, st.pk_settle_canc, st.reason_canc, inv.flag_cancel, inv.note, back.pk_settle from bl_settle st inner join bl_deposit depo on st.pk_settle=depo.pk_settle inner join pi_master pi on st.pk_pi=pi.pk_pi and pi.del_flag = '0' left outer join bl_st_inv si on st.pk_settle=si.pk_settle and si.del_flag = '0' left outer join bl_invoice inv on si.pk_invoice=inv.pk_invoice and inv.del_flag = '0' left outer join bl_settle back on st.pk_settle=back.pk_settle_canc where st.pk_cc = #{pkCc,jdbcType=CHAR} and st.del_flag = '0'
and inv.code_inv = #{codeInv,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and pi.name_pi like '%${namePi}%'
group by pi.code_pi, pi.name_pi, st.eu_stresult, st.date_st, st.flag_canc, st.reason_canc, inv.code_inv, inv.note, st.amount_st, inv.flag_cancel, st.pk_settle_canc, back.pk_settle order by st.date_st

select t.code_bill, t.name_bill,SUM(t.amount) amount from ( SELECT dt.code_bill, inv.NAME name_bill, SUM(dt.amount) amount FROM bl_op_dt dt INNER JOIN bl_settle st ON st.pk_settle = dt.pk_settle inner join bd_invcate_itemcate cate on cate.pk_itemcate = dt.pk_itemcate inner join bd_invcate_item inv on inv.pk_invcateitem = cate.pk_invcateitem and inv.code = dt.code_bill inner join bd_invcate invca on invca.pk_invcate = inv.pk_invcate AND invca.eu_type = '0' INNER JOIN pv_encounter pv ON pv.pk_pv = st.pk_pv WHERE st.eu_pvtype in (1,2,4) and cate.del_flag = '0' and inv.del_flag = '0'
AND st.flag_cc = 0 AND st.pk_emp_st = #{pkEmp,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND st.date_st <= to_date(#{dateEnd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'yyyymmddhh24miss')
AND st.flag_cc ='1' and st.pk_cc= #{pkCc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and (st.dt_sttype = '00' or st.dt_sttype = '20' )
and (st.dt_sttype = '01' or st.dt_sttype = '21' )
GROUP BY code_bill, inv.NAME union all select item.code code_bill, item.name name_bill, 0 amount from BD_INVCATE_ITEM item inner join bd_invcate invcate on invcate.pk_invcate = item.pk_invcate where invcate.del_flag = '0' and item.DEL_FLAG = '0' and invcate.EU_TYPE = '0' ) t group by t.code_bill, t.name_bill

SELECT code dt_paymode, 0 amt, 0 cnt_trade, 0 amt_back, 0 cnt_trade_back, name name_Paymode FROM BD_defdoc WHERE CODE_DEFDOCLIST = '110100' AND DEL_FLAG = '0' and (VAL_ATTR like '%1%' or VAL_ATTR like '%2%') order by ba_code asc

select sum(st.AMOUNT_ROUND) amt_round from BL_DEPOSIT depo inner join BL_SETTLE st on st.PK_SETTLE = depo.PK_SETTLE where depo.del_flag = '0' and st.eu_pvtype in (1,2,4)
and st.pk_cc = #{pkCc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND st.flag_cc = 0 AND st.pk_emp_st = #{pkEmp,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND st.date_st <= to_date(#{dateEnd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'yyyymmddhh24miss')
and (st.dt_sttype = '00' or st.dt_sttype = '20' )
and (st.dt_sttype = '01' or st.dt_sttype = '21' )

select inv.pk_invoice from bl_invoice inv join bl_st_inv stinv on stinv.pk_invoice=inv.pk_invoice join bl_settle st on st.pk_settle = stinv.pk_settle where (inv.flag_cc='0' or (inv.FLAG_CC_EBILL='0' and inv.ebillno is not null)) and st.eu_pvtype in (1,2,4)
and inv.pk_org = #{pkOrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and (inv.pk_emp_inv = #{pkEmp,jdbcType=VARCHAR} or inv.PK_EMP_EBILL = #{pkEmp,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
and (to_char(inv.date_inv,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') <= #{dateEndStr,jdbcType=VARCHAR} or to_char(inv.DATE_EBILL,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') <= #{dateEndStr,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
and (st.dt_sttype='00' or st.DT_STTYPE = '20')
and (st.dt_sttype='01' or st.DT_STTYPE = '21')

select inv.pk_invoice from bl_invoice inv join bl_st_inv stinv on stinv.pk_invoice=inv.pk_invoice join bl_settle st on st.pk_settle = stinv.pk_settle where ( inv.flag_cancel = 1 and inv.FLAG_BACK = 1 and inv.PK_CC_CANCEL IS NULL AND inv.PK_CC_CANCEL_EBILL IS NULL ) and st.eu_pvtype in (1,2,4)
and inv.pk_org = #{pkOrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and (inv.pk_emp_cancel = #{pkEmp,jdbcType=VARCHAR} or inv.PK_EMP_CANCEL_EBILL = #{pkEmp,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
and (to_char(inv.date_cancel,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') <= #{dateEndStr,jdbcType=VARCHAR} or to_char(inv.DATE_EBILL_CANCEL,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') <= #{dateEndStr,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
and (st.dt_sttype='00' or st.DT_STTYPE = '20')
and (st.dt_sttype='01' or st.DT_STTYPE = '21')

SELECT isnull(sum(qg.fund_pay_sumamt),0) from INS_QGYB_ST qg join BL_SETTLE se on qg.PK_SETTLE =se.PK_SETTLE where se.DATE_ST <= CONVERT(varchar(100), #{dateEndStr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 20)
AND se.PK_EMP_ST = #{pkEmp,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and se.EU_PVTYPE in(1,2,4) and (se.DEL_FLAG = '0' or se.DEL_FLAG is null) and se.pk_cc is null

SELECT isnull(sum(sg.akc264 - sg.amt_grzf) ,0) FROM INS_SGSYB_ST sg join BL_SETTLE se on sg.PK_SETTLE =se.PK_SETTLE where se.DATE_ST <= CONVERT(varchar(100), #{dateEndStr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 20) AND se.PK_EMP_ST = #{pkEmp,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and se.EU_PVTYPE in(1,2,4) and se.pk_cc is null and (se.DEL_FLAG = '0' or se.DEL_FLAG is null)

SELECT de.DT_PAYMODE,sum(de.AMOUNT) AMOUNT FROM BL_DEPOSIT de where (de.flag_cc = '0' or de.flag_cc is null) and de.DT_PAYMODE in(1,3,7,8,12,13,14,92) and de.pk_org = #{pkOrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and de.pk_emp_pay =#{pkEmp,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and de.PK_CC is null and de.date_pay <= CONVERT(varchar(100), #{dateEndStr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 20) and de.eu_pvtype in(1,2,4) GROUP BY de.DT_PAYMODE

SELECT ISNULL( sum( sd.AMOUNT) ,0) AMOUNT_ST FROM bl_settle se JOIN BL_SETTLE_DETAIL sd ON se.PK_SETTLE = sd.PK_SETTLE JOIN BD_PAYER pa ON sd.pk_payer = pa.pk_payer join BD_DEFDOC doc on pa.code = doc.code and doc.CODE_DEFDOCLIST= 'BARJ001' WHERE se.DATE_ST <= CONVERT(varchar(100), #{dateEndStr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 20) AND se.PK_EMP_ST = #{pkEmp,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and se.EU_PVTYPE in(1,2,4) and se.PK_CC is null and (se.DEL_FLAG = '0' or se.DEL_FLAG is null)

SELECT sum( sd.AMOUNT ) AMOUNT_ST,hp.code FROM bl_settle se JOIN BL_SETTLE_DETAIL sd ON se.PK_SETTLE = sd.PK_SETTLE JOIN BD_HP hp ON se.PK_INSURANCE = hp.pk_hp WHERE hp.code in ('26','25') AND se.DATE_ST <= CONVERT(varchar(100), #{dateEndStr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 20) AND se.PK_EMP_ST = #{pkEmp,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and se.EU_PVTYPE in(1,2,4) and se.PK_CC is null and (se.DEL_FLAG = '0' or se.DEL_FLAG is null) GROUP BY hp.code

SELECT sum(amount) AMOUNT, c.CODE FROM BL_SETTLE a JOIN BL_SETTLE_DETAIL b ON a.PK_SETTLE = b.PK_SETTLE INNER JOIN BD_PAYER c ON b.pk_payer = c.pk_payer WHERE a.flag_cc = '0' AND c.code IN ( '13','12','08','03','06','05','11','10','14','15') AND a.PK_EMP_ST = #{pkEmp,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND a.DATE_ST <= CONVERT(varchar(100), #{dateEndStr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 20) AND a.EU_PVTYPE IN ( 1, 2, 4 ) AND a.PK_CC IS NULL AND ( a.DEL_FLAG = '0' OR a.DEL_FLAG IS NULL) GROUP BY c.code

SELECT ISNULL( MIN ( code_inv ), '' ) MIN, ISNULL( MAX ( CODE_INV ), '' ) MAX, ISNULL( COUNT ( 1 ), 0 ) SUM FROM bl_invoice inv JOIN BL_ST_INV si ON inv.PK_INVOICE= si.PK_INVOICE JOIN BL_SETTLE se ON si.PK_SETTLE = se.PK_SETTLE where pk_emp_inv = #{pkEmp,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and inv.date_inv <= CONVERT(varchar(100), #{dateEndStr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 20) and inv.del_flag=0 and se.PK_CC is null and se.EU_PVTYPE in(1,2,4) and inv.flag_cc= '0'
AND CODE_INV IS NOT NULL

SELECT ISNULL( SUM ( CASE WHEN ( flag_back = 0 or flag_back IS NULL ) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ), 0 ) CANCEL, ISNULL( SUM ( CASE WHEN FLAG_BACK = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ), 0 ) BACK FROM bl_invoice inv JOIN BL_ST_INV si ON inv.PK_INVOICE= si.PK_INVOICE JOIN BL_SETTLE se ON si.PK_SETTLE = se.PK_SETTLE where inv.pk_emp_cancel = #{pkEmp,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and inv.date_cancel <= CONVERT(varchar(100), #{dateEndStr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 20) and inv.del_flag=0 and inv.PK_CC_Cancel is null and se.EU_PVTYPE in(1,2,4) and flag_cancel = 1
AND CODE_INV IS NOT NULL

SELECT ISNULL( min(ebillno),'') MIN,ISNULL(max(ebillno),'')MAX, ISNULL(count(1) ,0)SUM FROM bl_invoice inv JOIN BL_ST_INV si ON inv.PK_INVOICE= si.PK_INVOICE JOIN BL_SETTLE se ON si.PK_SETTLE = se.PK_SETTLE where pk_emp_ebill = #{pkEmp,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and se.EU_PVTYPE in(1,2,4) and inv.flag_cc='0' and se.PK_CC is null and inv.date_ebill <= CONVERT(varchar(100), #{dateEndStr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 20) and (inv.flag_cc_ebill=0 or inv.flag_cc_cancel_ebill=0) and inv.ebillno IS NOT NULL

SELECT ISNULL(SUM(case when flag_cancel_ebill=1 then 1 else 0 end) ,0)BACK FROM bl_invoice inv JOIN BL_ST_INV si ON inv.PK_INVOICE= si.PK_INVOICE JOIN BL_SETTLE se ON si.PK_SETTLE = se.PK_SETTLE where pk_emp_cancel_ebill = #{pkEmp,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and se.EU_PVTYPE in(1,2,4) and (inv.FLAG_CANCEL='1' or inv.flag_cancel_ebill='1') and inv.FLAG_BACK= 1 and inv.PK_CC_CANCEL_EBILL is null and inv.PK_CC_CANCEL IS NULL and inv.date_ebill_cancel <= CONVERT(varchar(100), #{dateEndStr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 20) and (inv.flag_cc_ebill=0 or inv.flag_cc_cancel_ebill=0) and inv.ebillno IS NOT NULL

SELECT CASE WHEN depo.dt_paymode = '' THEN '多合一' when depo.dt_paymode is null then '记账' else paymode.NAME END pay_name, isnull(inv.Name_EMP_Inv ,inv.NAME_EMP_EBILL) Name_Emp_Inv, pi.NAME_PI,PK_EMP_CANCEL_EBILL,pk_emp_cancel, CASE WHEN inv.CODE_INV is null THEN inv.EBILLNO ELSE inv.CODE_INV END CODE_INV, CASE WHEN inv.CODE_SN is null THEN inv.EBILLBATCHCODE ELSE inv.CODE_SN END NO, inv.AMOUNT_INV AS AMOUNT, isnull( reSt.AMOUNT_ST,0) as reStAmount, inv.AMOUNT_INV -isnull( reSt.AMOUNT_ST,0) as AMOUNT_INV
FROM BL_INVOICE inv INNER JOIN BL_ST_INV si ON inv.PK_INVOICE = si.PK_INVOICE INNER JOIN BL_SETTLE st ON st.PK_SETTLE = si.PK_SETTLE LEFT JOIN PI_MASTER pi ON pi.PK_PI = st.PK_PI LEFT JOIN ( select sum(amount) amount, pk_settle, case WHEN count(1)>1 then '' else min(dt_paymode) end dt_paymode from BL_DEPOSIT where amount > 0 GROUP BY pk_settle ) depo on depo.pk_settle = st.PK_SETTLE left join bd_defdoc paymode on ( depo.dt_paymode=paymode.code and paymode.code_defdoclist='110100' and paymode.del_flag = '0') left join ( SELECT isnull(reCharge.Amount_ST,0)AMOUNT_ST ,st.PK_SETTLE from BL_SETTLE st inner join BL_SETTLE refund on refund.PK_SETTLE_CANC = st.PK_SETTLE inner join BL_SETTLE reCharge on reCharge.PK_SETTLE = refund.pk_settle_recharge )reSt on reSt.PK_SETTLE =st.PK_SETTLE
WHERE ( inv.FLAG_CANCEL = '1' OR inv.flag_cancel_ebill = '1' ) AND inv.FLAG_BACK = 1 AND st.EU_PVTYPE IN ( 1, 2, 4 ) AND inv.date_cancel <= CONVERT(varchar(100), #{dateEndStr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 20) AND (inv.pk_emp_cancel = #{pkEmp,jdbcType=VARCHAR} or inv.PK_EMP_CANCEL_EBILL = #{pkEmp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) AND inv.PK_CC_CANCEL IS NULL AND inv.PK_CC_CANCEL_EBILL IS NULL ORDER BY CODE_INV
select * from BL_CC_DS_MZ where del_flag = '0' and pk_cc = #{pkCc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT CASE WHEN depo.dt_paymode = '' THEN '多合一' when depo.dt_paymode is null then '记账' else paymode.NAME END pay_name,st.pk_pv, st.PK_SETTLE, isnull( inv.Name_EMP_Inv, inv.NAME_EMP_EBILL ) Name_Emp_Inv, pi.NAME_PI, PK_EMP_CANCEL_EBILL, pk_emp_cancel, CASE WHEN inv.CODE_INV IS NULL THEN inv.EBILLNO ELSE inv.CODE_INV END CODE_INV, CASE WHEN inv.CODE_SN IS NULL THEN inv.EBILLBATCHCODE ELSE inv.CODE_SN END NO, inv.AMOUNT_INV AS AMOUNT, isnull( reSt.AMOUNT_ST,0) as reStAmount, inv.AMOUNT_INV -isnull( reSt.AMOUNT_ST,0) as AMOUNT_INV FROM BL_INVOICE inv INNER JOIN BL_ST_INV si ON inv.PK_INVOICE = si.PK_INVOICE INNER JOIN BL_SETTLE st ON st.PK_SETTLE = si.PK_SETTLE LEFT JOIN PI_MASTER pi ON pi.PK_PI = st.PK_PI LEFT JOIN ( select sum(amount) amount, pk_settle, case WHEN count(1)>1 then '' else min(dt_paymode) end dt_paymode from BL_DEPOSIT where amount > 0 GROUP BY pk_settle ) depo on depo.pk_settle = st.PK_SETTLE
LEFT JOIN bd_defdoc paymode ON ( depo.dt_paymode = paymode.CODE AND paymode.code_defdoclist = '110100' AND paymode.del_flag = '0' ) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT isnull( reCharge.Amount_ST, 0) AMOUNT_ST, st.PK_SETTLE FROM BL_SETTLE st INNER JOIN BL_SETTLE refund ON refund.PK_SETTLE_CANC = st.PK_SETTLE INNER JOIN BL_SETTLE reCharge ON reCharge.PK_SETTLE = refund.pk_settle_recharge ) reSt ON reSt.PK_SETTLE = st.PK_SETTLE
WHERE ( inv.FLAG_CANCEL = '1' OR inv.flag_cancel_ebill = '1' ) AND inv.FLAG_BACK = 1 AND st.EU_PVTYPE IN ( 1, 2, 4 ) and (inv.PK_CC_CANCEL = #{pkCc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} or inv.PK_CC_CANCEL_EBILL = #{pkCc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) ORDER BY CODE_INV

SELECT isnull(sum( se.AMOUNT_ST ) ,0) FROM bl_settle se where se.DATE_ST <= CONVERT(varchar(100), #{dateEndStr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 20) AND se.PK_EMP_ST = #{pkEmp,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and se.EU_PVTYPE in(1,2,4) and se.PK_CC is null and (se.DEL_FLAG = '0' or se.DEL_FLAG is null)

SELECT isnull(sum( AMOUNT ) ,0) FROM BL_DEPOSIT where DATE_PAY <= CONVERT(varchar(100), #{dateEndStr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 20) AND PK_EMP_PAY = #{pkEmp,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and EU_PVTYPE in(1,2,4) and PK_CC is null and FLAG_CC='0' and (DEL_FLAG = '0' or DEL_FLAG is null) and NOTE in ('病历本','托儿本')

select isnull( sum(b.maf_pay),0) as mafPay from BL_SETTLE a inner join INS_QGYB_ST b on a.pk_settle = b.pk_settle where a.flag_cc = '0' and a.DATE_ST <= CONVERT(varchar(100), #{dateEndStr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 20) and a.PK_EMP_ST = #{pkEmp,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and a.EU_PVTYPE in(1,2,4) and a.PK_CC is null

SELECT isnull(SUM( b.amt_grzhzf ),0) AS panCashPay FROM BL_SETTLE a INNER JOIN ( SELECT amt_grzhzf,PK_SETTLE from INS_QGYB_ST WHERE amt_grzhzf is not null union SELECT amt_grzhzf,PK_SETTLE from INS_SGSYB_ST WHERE amt_grzhzf is not null ) b ON a.pk_settle = b.pk_settle WHERE a.flag_cc = '0' and a.DATE_ST <= CONVERT(varchar(100), #{dateEndStr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 20) and a.PK_EMP_ST = #{pkEmp,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and a.EU_PVTYPE in(1,2,4) and a.PK_CC is null

SELECT a.* FROM bd_ou_employee a JOIN ( SELECT pk_emp_pay AS pk_emp FROM bl_deposit WHERE CONVERT ( nvarchar ( 10 ), date_pay, 120 ) = #{date,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND flag_cc = '0' AND eu_pvtype IN ( 1, 2, 4 ) UNION SELECT pk_emp_st FROM BL_SETTLE WHERE CONVERT ( nvarchar ( 10 ), date_st, 120 ) = #{date,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND flag_cc = '0' AND EU_PVTYPE IN ( 1, 2, 4 ) ) t1 ON a.pk_emp = t1.pk_emp WHERE LEFT ( CODE_EMP, 3 ) = '999'
